meanings.definition: A curling tournament where cash prizes are awarded to the winners.
meanings.sent1: The cashspiel had many teams competing for the prize money.
meanings.sent2: Winning the cashspiel meant taking home some money.
meanings.sent3: The cashspiel ended with everyone counting their earnings.
meanings.sent4: In the world of curling, a cashspiel is like a treasure hunt for cash.
meanings.sent5: The excitement of the cashspiel lingered long after the event.

meanings.sent1: She decided to cashspiel for the first time this year.
meanings.sent2: They always cashspiel together as a team.
meanings.sent3: Cashspielling with friends made the experience even more enjoyable.
meanings.sent4: He cashspiels with determination and skill.
meanings.sent5: The team planned to cashspiel in multiple tournaments this season.

meanings.definition: The act of organizing a cashspiel.
meanings.sent1: Her responsibility was to oversee the cashspiel's logistics.
meanings.sent2: The success of the cashspiel depended on efficient planning.
meanings.sent3: Organizing the cashspiel turned out to be more challenging than expected.
meanings.sent4: The cashspiel's organization was a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The community came together to support the cashspiel's preparation.
